body.name: Tribesigns Tall Bookcase Black Bookshelf, 70.8” Large Bookcases Organizer with LED Lights, Heavy Duty Free-Standing Library Bookshelf with 5-Tier Storage Shelves for Living Room, Bedroom (Black)
features: [High-quality with Amazing Load Capacity]: Made of thick particleboard and a heavy-duty powder-coated metal frame, this tall library bookshelf has a super large load capacity. Each shelf can load 88lbs. Totally 529lbs. The Shelves will NEVER sag under the weight of hardback books.

[Great Size & Closed Back Shelves]: Overall size: 31.5” L * 11.81” W * 70.87” H. Because of the great depth, it is a good home office decor to put your large books, dictionaries, figures, and models. Unlike other fragile cardboard, our closed backboard is made of thick particleboard.

[5-Tier Bookcases with LED Litinging]: Each tier of our tall bookshelf is equipped with an APP-controlled LED light strip, which can be adjusted to any color and brightness you like. Item weight: 65.4lbs. Heavy and strong.

[Safe Anti-dumping Kit & Adjustable Feet Pads]: For further security, we provide an anti-dumping kit to enhance the stability of the big bookcase. And this shelving unit has 4 legs that can be adjusted if you need to compensate for uneven floors, rugs, etc.

[Multifunctional Shelving Unit]: High quality, overall beautiful look, ample storage space, making this deep bookshelf can be placed in the living room, bedroom, library, study, den, reception area, classroom,etc. Ideal as a bookshelf bookcase, display shelf.

[Easy Assembly and Customer Service]: All labeled pieces and tools are included, strictly following the directions, it is easy to assemble. If you are not satisfied with our products, you can directly contact us, we will provide you with 18 months free warranty and a professional customer service team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Beautiful and Classic Library Bookshelf for Home Office Unlike other cheap quality bookshelves, our Tribesigns big and long bookcases are heavy and stable. With a totally 440lbs load capacity, this library book shelf will definitely hold your precious collectibles, trophies, DVDs, hardcover books, comic books without ragging and wobbling. The enclosed back baffle can not only protect your wall but also prevent dust from falling, which is easy to take care of your books. Made of E1 particleboard, is waterproof, scratch resistant, and easy to clean. Super Strong Structure makes this bookshelves storage has good support.Decent size with great depth, suitable for placing large books without protruding.Equipped with anti-dumping kit, making this shelving unit more safe and stable.Free-standing vertical design, Very sturdy and holds heavy books well.Look very stylish and expensive for the high-level bookshelf.Simple design, very easy to assemble.

Bookshelf with LED Lights - APP Control Super Strong Load Capacity & Large Storage Space 16 Million colors LEDs mode will refresh your home and add fashion style, you can choose any colors for any occasion.Press left or right to adjust the brightness from 0%--100%, and say goodbye to the trouble of finding the remote control to the lightBookcase features a simple and classic square design that fits both home or office, also provide ample space to store your favious items.Totally 5 tiers storage space, easily organize and display your books, magazines, toys, DVDs, or souvenirs.

Black Bookshelf Details Waterproof Surface With this classic balck texture, this 5-tier vertical bookcase is stylish and beautiful. Suitable for most home office decor. With waterproof surface. Wall Attchment Kit For further safety and security, we provide an extra wall attchment kit, it would be more stable when you put the 5-tier bookshelf on carpet or pad. Adjustable Feet Pads This storage shelving unit has legs that can be adjusted if you need to compensate for uneven floors, rugs, etc. It will never sagging. Large Load Capacity This heavy display rack is made of thick heavy-duty metal frame, which provides a strong capacity and makes it solid and sturdy. Each shelf load 88lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great - easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The color and style of this bookcase is great. This is so easy to assemble. Every piece is marked and the directions make sense.Great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book shelf!
reviews.reviewText: Exceeded my expectations! Sturdy an visually appealing for my kids room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needs two people
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this shelf! It really does take two people to put together. Also is very heavy in the box. Well worth the price in my eyes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Spacious, Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: Love this book shelf. It's very sturdy and easy to install. I installed it all by myself within half an hour. The final product looks great and has a lot of room. Happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars color is lighter than expected
reviews.reviewText: got this for my son . not sure on any details but definetely a lighter color than what we seen pictured online. sandalwood

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Confusing Customer Service, Bad Manufacturing
reviews.reviewText: Update: it has been over a month since I contacted customer service about the issue with the part and I have not received a replacement. I doubt they ever sent it in the first placeI am unable to complete assembly of this unit because one of the pieces of the foot base was sent to me is totally mis-manufactured. As you can see in the photos, the holes where screws need to be inserted were punched in the wrong place, and I can't even put a screw through the hole because another piece of metal is blocking the opening.I called customer service about this and after waiting on hold, they told me they couldn't complete a part order over the phone and I needed to send an email. I sent all of the required information only to have to re-send it again. Now they are saying it will take up to two weeks to receive the new part, but the original shipment of the unit only took 4-5 days.Cross your fingers you get a correctly manufactured unit when you order from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Incorrect weight given
reviews.reviewText: These shelves are listed as weighing about 68 pounds. Upon arrival I found they actually weigh more than 85 pounds. I am hoping this translates to sturdier than expected shelving. I did almost kill myself trying to get the boxes into my home. Building them is not too difficult but I do recommend two people be on hand. There were minor dings and defects on some of the parts but they would have needed to be far more extensive for me to consider repackaging this for a return
